summary:
Geology PhD, Lean technical software project leader, business analyst and Agile product owner, with 24y of Shell Exploration and Production experience, as well as software technology development leadership in a half dozen projects. Principal geoscience software consultant at PDS, leading two commercial, Scrum - Kanban / DevOps product development teams from seismic interpretation to reservoir simulation.


Driven to go beyond traditional boundaries and thinking, to solve complex subsurface interpretation and modelling problems, and to make others more productive by making complex things easy to do.
Created and led bleeding edge technological innovation on the frontiers of E&P, delivering business impact in both. 

Such innovations in business productivity demonstrated: 
- deep understanding of business processes and goals in Exploration opportunity realization and Production field development
- leadership in getting better, complex science into easier and well integrated software tools, with self-generated budgets
- experience with the human and organizational factors that embrace or resist changes to traditional ways of working, and to business processes across organizational boundaries. 

Experienced in training geoscientists to make the most of existing data with advanced tools.

company.name: PDS Group (also known as Petrotechnical Data Systems)

profile_positions.description:
Principal Geoscientist, at PDS Group, Rijswijk, NL
Product manager for technical software to assist in quality control of structural seismic interpretation, and to assess uncertainty in fault connectivity and its impact on reservoir compartmentalisation and development decisions, all with 1 button click.
Evaluate external technologies, define company product roadmaps and provide consulting support to geoscience software projects, such as fracture data interpretation and modelling, faulted reservoir modelling and fluid simulation. 
Dimension: 2 Agile software products and 10 technical software developers and QA engineers in 2 DevOps / Scrum - Kanban teams; overall design of computational process, UX, documentation and release management.
profile_positions.title: Principal Geoscientist

profile_positions.description:
Identified pre-salt prospectivity offshore Brazil. Using interpretive imaging, spearheaded seismic velocity model and workflow improvements to further reduce uncertainty with prevalent volcanics, Albian rafts, and salt.
Taught Shell Brazil staff how to adopt the critical mindset of interpretive velocity modeling and imaging, and to bring it into systematic practice in cooperation with seismic processors.
profile_positions.title: Senior Exploration Geoscientist

profile_positions.description: Target-oriented RTM shot selection R&D for accelerated interpretive seismic imaging. Included development of directional full-wave modeling as alternative to ray-tracing for dip-oriented illumination.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscience Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Highlight: In field tests of interpretive salt modeling plugin in Shell proprietary interpretation system, removed long standing Exploration bottleneck through novel interactive interpretive modeling of complex salt, including realistic, sharp cusps, and loop fidelity. 
Managed two technical software projects. 
SB geophysical and geological requirements analysis, design, and development, integrated with Shell’s other subsurface software. Pilot technology deployment support.
Managed development of vendor neutral inter-application data management and integration technology. Guided development across the ocean to first field test between static and dynamic reservoir modeling applications. Coordinated with business customers and representatives, related subsurface software technology groups, and internal and external software technology providers.
profile_positions.title: Geoscience Technologist

profile_positions.description:
Highlight: With deployment of seismic velocity scenario testing (“VST”) technology prior to Gabon lease sale, junior geologist conclusively disproved large apparent subsalt closures. They were caused by systematic errors in the vendor velocity model that ignored geological complexity. Saved Shell from commitment to drill expensive DW dry holes in this block and others on trend. 
Product and deployment leader for several features and plugins in proprietary seismic interpretation software GeoSigns, including seismic velocity modeling, scanning and user guided inversion and imaging, and interpretive structural modeling. Interactive 2D stratigraphic age modeling with faults contributed to Shell patent and is now deployed. For proprietary next generation basin modeling technology, did requirements analysis in context of Exploration opportunity realization process and prospect generation and evaluation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Seismic Interpreter

profile_positions.description:
Highlights: Deployment successes of VST in Gabon and GoM. In Gabon, uncovered intra-salt sediments with very low velocity. Implied major increase in prospect GRV and a geohazard, proven correct by subsequent acquisition, processing and drilling. 
Expansion and upscaling of previous role to team of 5 Shell staff plus 2 technology supplier companies. Added powerful feature to interpretive imaging: interactive, user guided seismic velocity scanning and inversion. Automated corresponding complicated workflow and its data management. Keeps interpreter productive and focused on business goal. 
Also GameChanger funded proof-of-concept interpretive structural modeling for integrated seismic interpretation, velocity modeling, imaging and geomechanics in complex geology. Demonstrated capability to reduce business process cycle time between those domains, with aim to reduce risks in prospect GRV, geohazards, and borehole stability.
profile_positions.title: Exploratory research geoscientist

profile_positions.description:
Initiator and leader of GameChanger R&D projects to create business value with tools that combine geophysics with geology, yet are easy to use. 
First software tool for interactive seismic interpretation and modeling of complex faults and fault framework, with fast updates of integrated 3D faulted stacked reservoir model, together with JOA, now BHI.
First interactive seismic velocity and depth imaging tool (VST) integrated with seismic interpretation. Enables every explorer to improve seismic velocity and image by testing of geological model scenarios. Early deployment in Egypt and GoM with experienced and novice explorers. 
Highlight: In run-up to GoM lease sale, improvement of subsalt image with VST and further analysis led Shell to successfully outbid competitors with tiny margin for OCS block that attracted highest total bid ($325MM). DW well was drilled at 75% WI with almost no Shell Capex and 30% below budget.
Both technology projects delivered groundbreaking integration of geophysical and geological business processes, designed with interpreter in mind. Mathematical, non-numerical technology used to hide complex data management under the hood, and to focus user attention on data and model diagnostics and on cracking the business problem.
Project leader responsible for delivery with three external technology suppliers and for maintaining cross-company focus on Shell business impact.
profile_positions.title: Gamechanger frontier researcher

profile_positions.description:
Production seismologist in integrated asset development projects, mainly in Nigeria, Kuwait and Oman. Also experience with data rooms, and co-evaluated opportunities in Egypt (onshore), India (offshore) and Papua-New Guinea (onshore).
In Nigeria FDP, interpreted and mapped complex, faulted stacked reservoirs with 70 compartments using my proprietary structural framework modeling software, and identified 500MM bbl in additional reserves and contingent resources. 
In Kuwait FDP, was noted for identifying B+bbl flank upside through more complete and objective uncertainty modeling. 
For Oman FDP, did QI to understand reservoir heterogeneity and production history, and to identify unswept oil.
profile_positions.title: Production Seismologist

profile_positions.description: Business value from proprietary structural framework modeling software in first major deployment (Nigeria, 100+ faults through 10+ stacked reservoirs) already exceeded entire development cost through better well placement to tap unproduced compartments. Software design, programming, integration with seismic interpretation (LandMark) and reservoir modeling (Shell GEOCAP) to reduce feedback time between them, testing, documentation, training, support, budget and 5 person team planning and management. Subject Matter Expert for palinspastic reconstruction. Consulted in several thrust belt farm-in opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Structural Geologist
